snippet: A reader asks whether Clement Clarke Moore, known for a famous holiday poem, was indeed the primary developer of the Chelsea section of Manhattan.
abstract: FYI column discusses whether Clement Clarke Moore, author of poem 'Twas the Night Before Christmas, was also the major developer of Manhattan's Chelsea neighborhood.
lead_paragraph: A reader asks whether Clement Clarke Moore, known for a famous holiday poem, was indeed the primary developer of the Chelsea section of Manhattan.

headline.main: ‘Twas the Night Before Christmas’ and Its Ties to Chelsea
